Title: Relates to the duty of real estate brokers to supervise salesmen and associate brokers
Summary: Codifies the duty of real estate brokers to supervise salesmen and associate brokers through regular, frequent and consistent personal guidance, instruction and oversight; lists elements of supervision including the ability to familiarize salesmen with state and federal laws against discrimination.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to the duty of a licensed real estate broker to supervise real estate salesmen
